column1: Den Chai railway station is a railway station located in Den Chai Subdistrict
column3: Phrae. It is a Class 1 railway station and is the main station for Phrae Province
column4: as there is no rail service to Phrae City. It is located about 530 kilometres (330 mi) from Bangkok railway station. It is also the station to alight for passengers heading to Nan Province. Den Chai Station was once planned to be the junction for the Den Chai-Chiang Rai Railway Line
column5: but the line was never built.
